eng: For 3s after using an name{Elemental Burst} or creating a shield, the equipping character can gain the name{Primordial Jade Regalia} effect: Restore 4.5 Energy every 2.5s, and gain %{text_percent|0|2} Elemental DMG Bonus for their corresponding Elemental Type for every 1,000 name{Max HP} they possess, up to %{text_percent_max}. name{Primordial Jade Regalia} will still take effect even if the equipping character is not on the field.
